title: All the difference
brief_description: Examines the effect pollution can have on a future generation by contrasting the beautiful land of America as described by Walt Whitman, Robert Frost, Robert Penn Warren, Henry Wadsworth Longfellow and other poets, with the pollution of the environment as seen in the smog-obscured skies, dead waters and debris-strewn streets.
